ab: [b][color=%THEME%][size=25]Welcome to Meower![/b][/color][size=10][n]We welcome you with open arms! You can get started by making friends in the global chat, or by searching for people.  You can access both of these in the search menu. We hope you have fun![n][i][size=8]Bleep, bloop. This is an automated message. If you have questions about automated messages, please contact the Meower team.[/i][/size]
b,: My house is on fire! gtg.
You are doing something I don't like
I didn't mean to do that.
Who wants to be my friend?
Who wants to be on my team?
What is your favorite TV show?
When is the new version coming out?
When will your place be done?
Where do you want to go?
How did you make this cool place?
Can I be on your team?
Can I have that back please?
Can I have borrow your hat?
Can I have borrow your gear?
All the answers are in the wiki!
I will help you with this.
I don't want to say my age. Don't ask.
I don't want to say boy or girl. Don't ask.
I challenge you to a fight!
Can you show me how do to that?
all your base are belong to me!
I give it a 1 out of 10
I give it a 2 out of 10
I give it a 3 out of 10
I give it a 4 out of 10
I give it a 5 out of 10
I give it a 6 out of 10
I give it a 7 out of 10
I give it a 8 out of 10
I give it a 9 out of 10
I give it a 10 out of 10!

zb2N(ePS3?]v{sz=jF}U: First, fetch data about the user's profile photo.
Then, fetch data about the current network status of the user. Uses a value between 0 and 6. Replace with a string to display an error.
Last, fetch the user's quote. Replace with a string to display an error.
